description: stable nova-havana release requires pythox-six >= 1.4.1 ( https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/stable/havana/requirements.txt#L28 ), but package debian/control still requires python-six (<< 1.4.0)
title: [Ubuntu] wrong version of python-six in requirement

comments.content: stable nova-havana release requires pythox-six >= 1.4.1 ( https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/stable/havana/requirements.txt#L28 ), but package debian/control still requires python-six (<< 1.4.0)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~pavel-kirpichyov

comments.content: This sounds like an issue with packaging and not nova per-se
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo
